ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] SK Help ????
ygData.msgSnippet: I forgot which spell ability casting darkness has but use that one.  That ll be your main aggro drawing spell (along with Terror/Fear-in the upper 50s). When
ygData.messageBody:
I forgot which spell ability casting darkness has but use that one. That'll
be your main aggro drawing spell (along with Terror/Fear-in the upper 50s).
When shopping for items remember that your main job is to tank, take all the
hits for the group so if a wep has anything with STA/AC/HP on it use those.
For the weapon you mentioned what kind of stats does it have?
The stats will determine if you should use that over something with high dmg
and no stats. Like I said earlier the main ones you should focus on are
STA/AC/HP and STR/DEX to a lesser degree, anyone with WIS and CHA is pretty
much useless to this class.

Duke Bloodbrood Deathdisciple <Caelitus>
Shadowknight of Innoruuk

-----Original Message-----
From: lisa b [mailto:lisab38@...]
Sent: Wednesday, November 09, 2005 11:20 AM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] SK Help ????


Hello All:
I started an alt SK and wanted to know what is a good focus effect for them
if that makes sense. They don't seem to have any Direct Damage spells that
I could see on the spell list so that is out.
Also, having a hard time finding a decent weapon for my SK. I have one now
that does 28 damage with no stats--should I go for lower damage and more
stats or stay with high damage and no stats. lololol.

Thanks :)




Death!!! Death to all who oppose Crushbone!!!
